entries.name: new()
entries.desc: Creates a new TomDoc parser.  See also RDoc::Markup.parse

entries.name: build_heading(level)
entries.desc: Builds a heading from the token stream

entries.name: build_paragraph(margin)
entries.desc: Builds a paragraph from the token stream

entries.name: build_verbatim(margin)
entries.desc: Builds a verbatim from the token stream.  A verbatim in the Examples section will be marked as in Ruby format.

entries.name: tokenize(text)
entries.desc: Turns text into an Array of tokens
